channel.title: 508 npc hp?
channel.description:
Hi mopar, so i'm pretty new to 508 servers and i'm having a hard time figuring out how to change an NPC's hp.
I found this in the "npclist" but i don't think its what i'm looking for considering it only includes a few of the many npc's in the server. [code=java]// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND npc = 50 276 240 25 2 8 90 91 89 92 6 King_Black_Dragon A_fierce_dragon_with_black_scales. npc = 2745 702 312 60 2 12 90 9277 9278 9279 7 TzKot-Jad This_is_going_to_hurt... npc = 103 19 15 1 2 8 30 5540 5541 5542 6 Ghost A_Ghost. npc = 3348 999 1500 10000 2 8 90 91 89 92 6 White_Knight Don't_attack_it... npc = 53 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon. npc = 54 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon. npc = 55 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon. npc = 5363 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon. npc = 742 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon. npc = 941 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon. npc = 2627 22 20 2 2 8 30 9232 9231 9230 6 Tz-Kih A_Tz-Kih. npc = 2629 45 50 5 2 8 30 9233 9235 9234 6 Tz-Kik A_Tz-Kik. npc = 2631 90 100 15 2 8 30 9245 9242 9239 6 Tok-Xil A_Tok-Xil. npc = 82 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon. npc = 4694 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon. npc = 4695 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon. npc = 4696 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon. npc = 4697 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon.
[/code]
I know HP is what i'm looking for, but this doesn't include data for every npc in the game, so where is the rest of it? if i'm not being clear enough please ask for more info. by the way i'm using davidscape also if anyone can tell me what these mean in the code above: AT WN SD AE BE DE AD That would be helpful.
Just looking for a little help, it's hard to find tuts on stuff this simple :o

[quote=“Carnifex12, post:5, topic:472157”]i don’t think you understand, i can’t add in the code for a man (i know it’s 2) because if i don’t fill out each line then it gives me an error when i run the server. some of the info on this page is animation codes, and i can’t add those in if i don’t know what they are.

and yeah lol have to change the 10k thing…[/quote]
Then google??

item.title: 508 npc hp?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Carnifex12, post:3, topic:472157”]i know thats the hp, but what i’m trying to find out is how to change the hp for a NPC not on this list.

for example: a man in my server has about 100 hp, and i want to change that. but the id for a man is not on this list and i can’t add it because i don’t know the animations.

there has to be some code somewhere, that says a man has 100 hp. thats what i’m looking for[/quote]
They aren’t animations, they are NPC’s
a man is typically npc 2.
Add him in.
Edit: LOL I just noticed your black night hits 10k…

Read full topic

item.title: 508 npc hp?
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

Hi mopar, so i’m pretty new to 508 servers and i’m having a hard time figuring out how to change an NPC’s hp.

I found this in the “npclist” but i don’t think its what i’m looking for considering it only includes a few of the many npc’s in the server.

[code=java]// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND
npc = 50 276 240 25 2 8 90 91 89 92 6 King_Black_Dragon A_fierce_dragon_with_black_scales.
npc = 2745 702 312 60 2 12 90 9277 9278 9279 7 TzKot-Jad This_is_going_to_hurt…
npc = 103 19 15 1 2 8 30 5540 5541 5542 6 Ghost A_Ghost.
npc = 3348 999 1500 10000 2 8 90 91 89 92 6 White_Knight Don’t_attack_it…
npc = 53 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon.
npc = 54 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon.
npc = 55 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon.
npc = 5363 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon.
npc = 742 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon.
npc = 941 100 100 15 2 8 30 91 89 92 6 Dragon A_Dragon.
npc = 2627 22 20 2 2 8 30 9232 9231 9230 6 Tz-Kih A_Tz-Kih.
npc = 2629 45 50 5 2 8 30 9233 9235 9234 6 Tz-Kik A_Tz-Kik.
npc = 2631 90 100 15 2 8 30 9245 9242 9239 6 Tok-Xil A_Tok-Xil.
npc = 82 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon.
npc = 4694 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon.
npc = 4695 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon.
npc = 4696 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon.
npc = 4697 90 100 15 2 8 30 64 65 67 6 Lesser_Demon A_Lesser_Demon.

[/code]

I know HP is what i’m looking for, but this doesn’t include data for every npc in the game, so where is the rest of it?
if i’m not being clear enough please ask for more info. by the way i’m using davidscape
also if anyone can tell me what these mean in the code above: AT WN SD AE BE DE AD
That would be helpful.

Just looking for a little help, it’s hard to find tuts on stuff this simple :o

Read full topic
